name: Alone In The Dark House
description:
___Alone In The Dark House___

Alone In The Dark House Is Based On The LOST Game 'Alone In The Dark Forest' Which Was Not Good Game From Us, So Alone In The Dark Forest Is Based On A Character Called Kyle Who Returned To His House From Work At Midnight. But His House Doesn't Seems To Be The Same, Something Gone Wrong Maybe? Is He Cursed? Is The House Haunted?

___ABOUT THE GAME___

Alone In The Dark House Is A Horror Game Which Contains Jumpscares! Also! AITDH Brings The Player Into A Lost Maze Of A Haunted House. Into A Situation Which No One Can Explain!

___WARNING___

THE GAME CONTAINS A LOT OF JUMPSCARES AND IT'S NOT ALLOWED TO BE PLAYED IF YOU ARE UNDER THE 12 YEARS OLD! IF YOU ARE A PERSON WHO SUFFERS FROM HEART ATTACKS OR IF YOU ARE A PREGNANT WOMAN, WE ARE NOT RECOMMEND YOU TO PLAY THIS GAME! We Warned You,  We Take No Responsibility For Your Health

___SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS___

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE i3 8100

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GT710 2GB LP- Radeon RX 550 2GB

•RAM: 8GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: AT LEAST 1GB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i5-3570K

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 1050 ti 4GB -R9 280X 3GB

•RAM: 12GB RAM

• DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I5-6500 OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 4GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: AT LEAST 1GB STORAGE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY (1920 x 1080 Recommended)

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____

  • 3 GHz PROCCESOR 
  • 8 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 ti 4GB/ RADEON R9 280X 3GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • AT LEAST 1GB STORAGE SPACE

THE DEVELOPERS DESCIRBE THE CONTENT LIKE THIS:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: FEAR, TERROR, HORROR

Rated 16+
